name: pig-dice-master
description: Behavior: Roll button generates number between 1 and 6. Input: click Output: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, or 6. Behavior: If a one is rolled, user score becomes 0. Input: 1 Output: 0 Behavior: All non-one numbers are summed to a score. Input:2, 4, 4, 3 Output:13 Behavior: If a one is rolled during a sequence of rolls, the sum is set to 0. Input: 2,4,4,3,1 Output: 0 Behavior: If "holds" is selected, the turn switches to other player. Input: hold Output: next player's turn Behavior: If sum for either player reaches 100, game will end in victory for that player. Input: sum = 100 Output: "This player has won!"
